name: The Last Seed (studzy)
description:
A game where you're a seed which has to find it's place

The Last Seed is a short innovative platformer that puts you in the shoes of a wandering seed. Your task is to navigate through obstacles and seek out the perfect landing spot to germinate and grow. As the wind carries you, you must skillfully guide the seed, keeping it afloat, and ensuring it doesn't crash to the ground.

This is a game I challenged myself to make in 7 days, so please criticize harshly and tell me about any bug, glitch or anything of that sort you found in the comments.

Controls:

W, up arrow - Up

S, down arrow - Down
